content: knit lil football designed by lorraine pistorio i hope you enjoy creating your own football for someone special materials  #4-worsted wt aran/10-ply yarn less than 100 yds i used lion brand vanna s choice toffee & white  size 4 3 5mm 32 circular knitting needles if using magic loop or double pointed needles  large-eyed blunt needle polyester fiberfill stuffing skill level beginner / intermediate size approx 6 ½ long depending on type of yarn needles used and personal gauge gauge not critical for this project knit tightly enough so stuffing doesn t show through stitches used k knit p purl cast-on bind-off stitch explanation  kfb = knit into the front & back of the stitch… 1 stitch increased  k2tog = knit 2 stitches together knit-wise… 1 stitch decreased  m1 = make one pick up the bar between the stitches from front to back use the right needle to knit this bar through the back loop… 1 stitch increased notes  this football is knit in the round using the magic loop method on a long circular needle using magic loop keeping both needles close together and giving a tug on the yarn when switching needles will prevent ladders from forming between the needles if you are unfamiliar with this method there are many youtube videos on magic loop you may wish to view double pointed needles may be used instead of magic loop inquiries contact rainebodesigns@yahoo com ©2015 lorraine pistorio this pattern is not to be sold or given for free to others if you use this pattern to make items for commercial use please give me credit for the pattern please feel free to sell any completed items made from my designed pattern or donate any completed items to charity do not copy reproduce sell and/or distribute this pattern in any form this design and material is copyrighted and protected by federal copyright infringement knit lil football designed by lorraine pistorio i hope you enjoy creating your own football for someone special using main color yarn cast on 5 sts continue in main color yarn… round 1 kfb x 5 = 10 sts 38 k6 k2tog x 5 = 35 sts 2 k 39 k 3 k2 m1 x 5 = 15 sts 40 k5 k2tog x 5 = 30 sts stuff football firmly to this point 4 k 41 k 5 k3 m1 x 5 = 20 sts 42 k4 k2tog x 5 = 25 sts 6 k 43 k 7 k4 m1 x 5 = 25 sts 44 k3 k2tog x 5 = 20 sts 8 k 45 k 9 k5 m1 x 5 = 30 sts 46 k2 k2tog x 5 = 15 sts 10 k 47 k 11 k6 m1 x 5 = 35 sts 48 k1 k2tog x 5 = 10 sts 49 k2tog x 5 = 5 sts continue in white color yarn… do not bind off cut yarn leaving long tail and thread yarn tail onto
